Text:
No worries bro, We aint done yet!

Your welcome and enjoy!!

My daughter is returning to college this weekend and she and her friends are planning a "Bad Movie Saturday Night" as a student fund raising event.She has enough schlock to carry her through Christmas.It sound like a lot of fun.
Seriously,I have several doctor's appointments soon and I am going to be fitted for an artificial leg 19 Aug,2010 Wish me luck.I'm gonna need it.

I wait for Dimension 6 and 7...
Just joking, thanks from Thailand for these rare films (where else to see them ?). Fab

@GeekHillbilly

Through several Xmas's I'm thinking lol

Seriously though,  Hang in there bro and lemmi know how it goes.

You Rock!!  Thanks!

Nothing to compare with GeekHillbilly but I'm going through alcoholic withdrawal and without those gems to keep me alive, I'd put a bullet through my head. Good luck Geek!!! and thank you bitstreeem...you don't have TOBOR THE GREAT do you, friend?

@chloro2008 

Dont have that, but I'll see if I can find it.  

On the other hand YOU take care man.  I know exactly what your going through and I know if you stay on the path it WILL get better.

Thanks and enjoy!
